Methodology

How We Estimate Doubao

Primary method: Direct disclosure. ByteDance/Volcano Engine is one of the most transparent AI vendors in terms of token volume data. They publish periodic updates via blog posts and investor communications.

Extrapolation between anchors: Between official data points, we apply compound daily growth rates. The current growth trajectory shows deceleration from +33%/mo (early 2024) to +5-8%/mo (early 2026), consistent with market maturation.

Cross-validation: Doubao's numbers are cross-validated against Volcano Engine's disclosed compute infrastructure spend and third-party estimates from Epoch AI.

Key assumption: ByteDance's "tokens/day" figures include all Doubao services â€” consumer app, Volcano Engine API, and internal applications. This is an "All Services" metric, comparable to Google's "All Surfaces" disclosure.

Tokenizer note: Chinese text tokenization produces more tokens per character in most tokenizers. A 1000-character Chinese document may generate 1.5-2Ã— more tokens than a 1000-character English document. This partially explains China's dominance in raw token volume.
